## Load libraries
```{r load_test, error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dbplyr)
library(dplyr)
```


## Load data

```{r load}
filenames <- list.files("../output", pattern="*.csv", full.names=TRUE)
dfs <- lapply(filenames, read.csv)
names(dfs) <- substr(filenames, 11, 30)

names(dfs)
```
```{r load_test}
summary(dfs$`a280_1000.csv`)
```

```{r combined_df}
combined_df <- bind_rows(dfs, .id="instance")
unique(combined_df$instance)
```

## Working time

```{r working_time}
ggplot(dfs$`a280_1000.csv`, aes(x=elapsed_time_ms/loop_count, y=optimizer_name)) + geom_boxplot()
```


```{r working_time2}
ggplot(combined_df, aes(x=best_cost, y=optimizer_name)) + geom_point() + facet_wrap(~instance)
```
